entry.title: $1950 // Studio near Columbia University. NO Broker FEES!!!
entry.content:
The apartment on the corner of Broadway and 108th Streets is just minutes away from Columbia University. This renovated quiet STUDIO in an elevator co-op building has a cozy kitchen with brand new refrigerator and stove, microwave oven, toaster and grill. TWO thru-wall airconditioners, the unit has a cute loft, modern bathroom with designer sink/vanity, one large closet and one small. Building amenities in the entertainment center include a lounge with pool table and kitchen, party space, Cable TV, stereo, bike storage, renovated laundry room and an outdoor courtyard. 24/7 friendly live-in Resident Manager/ Superintendent. The rent is $1,950. per month.

EMAIL, CALL OR TEXT FOR SCHEDULING A VIEWING

entry.title: $2000 // GREAT APT! Brownstone SUNFILLED W/ LRG LVG RM/BDRM & SEP KIT
entry.content:
LISTING BY MANHATTAN-SPACES.COM

GREAT APT! Brownstone SUNFILLED W/ LRG LVG RM/BDRM & SEP KIT





Located West 100's in the upper west side near Columbia University in Morningside Heights.

This apartment is renovated one bedroom apartment that has LIVING ROOM, QUEEN BEDROOM, FULL SEPARATE KITCHEN, FULL BATHROOM, wood floors, great details, ample closet space, and high ceiling. There is super in the building and laundry next door.

It is only 5 to 10 minute walk to the university. Within the area is St. John's the divine, Columbia University, Barnard College, Manhattan School of Music, Central Park, Riverside Park, fine restaurants, cafes, outside eatries, trendy bars, and specialty stores.

Transportation is very good with subway line on 103rd St. and 110th St. stations (1/b/c) on Broadway/Central Park West and bus stations (M104/4/5//7/11/60/10). Please call for further information.

CONTACT

WALKER

(646) 872-1234



Other apartments currently available in: Battery Park City, Chelsea, Financial District, West Greenwich Village,Gramercy Park, Greenwich Village, Kips Bay, Lower East Side, Midtown East, Midtown West, Clinton, Hell's Kitchen, East Greenwich Village, Murray Hill, Soho, Sutton Place, Carnegie Hill, Tribeca, Turtle Bay and Upper East Side.

entry.title: $2298 // GREAT APT!! DOORMAN SUNFILLED W/ NEW KIT/BATH, FOYER & LAUNDRY
entry.content:
LISTING BY MANHATTAN-SPACES.COM

West 110's DOORMAN SUNFILLED W/ 500SF, NEW KIT/BATH, FOYER & LAUNDRY





Located West 110's off Broadway in the upper west side near Columbia University in Morningside Heights.

This apartment is renovated large studio apartment that has LARGE LIVING SPACE, NEW FULL KITCHEN, NEW FULL MARBLE BATHROOM, wood floors, great details, ample closet space, and high ceiling. There is LAUNDRY, BIKE ROOM and super in the building.

It is only 5 to 10 minute walk to the university. Within the area is St. John's the divine, Columbia University, Barnard College, Manhattan School of Music, Central Park, Riverside Park, fine restaurants, cafes, outside eatries, trendy bars, and specialty stores.

Transportation is very good with subway line on 110th St. and 116th St. stations (1/b/c) on Broadway/Central Park West and bus stations (M104/4/5//7/11/60/10). Please call for further information.
